text.en: Special Summon "Armament Reincarnation Tokens" (Warrior/LIGHT/Level 1/ATK 500/DEF 500) up to the number of Equip Spells, and Traps with an effect that equip themselves to a monster, in your GY, then you can destroy as many cards in your Spell & Trap Zone as possible, including this card, then Set as many Equip Spells, and Traps with an effect that equips themselves to a monster, as possible from your GY. These Traps can be activated this turn. For the rest of this turn, you cannot Special Summon.
